translation.en: Ah, shit, I can't remember the damn door code.
translation.zh: 操 我想不起该死的门锁密码了

translation.en: [man 1] Is security not there?
translation.zh: 保安不在吗？

translation.en: Uh, let's just wait. Somebody coming out will let us in.
translation.zh: 等等吧 有人出来 我们就能进去了

translation.en: 'Scuse me, oh, miss?
translation.zh: 不好意思 哦 小姐？

translation.en: Can you let us in please? We locked out.
translation.zh: -能请你开个门吗？ -我们被锁外面了

translation.en: -[man 2] We forgot the code. -[man 3] Hello?
translation.zh: 我们忘记了密码 小姐

translation.en: Oh, here we go.
translation.zh: 又来了

translation.en: -[man 2] We're not gonna rob you. -We work here.
translation.zh: -我们不会抢劫你的 -我们在这里工作

translation.en: -Okay, wow, this is taking... -Yeah.
translation.zh: -好的 哇 这… -耶

translation.en: We're friendly, we went to college.
translation.zh: 我们很友善 受过高等教育

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Old ass hoe. Man, I can't believe she did that.
translation.zh: 老婊子 兄弟 她那么做让我难以置信

translation.en: That was insane.
translation.zh: 太蠢了

translation.en: -It's 2020, baby. -It is.
translation.zh: -都2020年了 兄弟 -就是

translation.en: -Yeah, man. -I'm gonna report her to the building.
translation.zh: -没错 兄弟 -我要向大楼物业举报她

translation.en: -Like, we can't be executives? -Exactly.
translation.zh: 就像我们没法当主管？ -正是如此 -耶 我们是主管

translation.en: -[knocking] -Yeah, we executives.
translation.zh: -正是如此 -耶 我们是主管

translation.en: Hey, could one of you let me in, I forgot my key card.
translation.zh: 嘿 你们谁能开门让我进去吗？ 我忘了带钥匙卡

translation.en: God damn, that's a... that's a Dracula, man.
translation.zh: 操 那是德古拉 兄弟

translation.en: -Here we go. -Don't let that biting ass nigga in here.
translation.zh: -又来了 -别让那个咬人的黑鬼进来

translation.en: Wow, really, brother? It's 2020, okay?
translation.zh: 哇 当真 兄弟？都2020年了 行吗？

translation.en: I work here. I've got a meeting on the third floor.
translation.zh: 我在这里工作 我在三楼有个会议

translation.en: -What's the name of the company? -I've got blood in a plastic cup.
translation.zh: -公司的名字是什么？ -我的塑料杯子里有血

translation.en: Okay, I'm not gonna bite you, I'm a day walker.
translation.zh: 我不会咬你们的 我是个日行者

translation.en: Damn, he right, I'm gonna let him in.
translation.zh: 操 他说得在理 我要让他进来

translation.en: -Hey, hey, hey, hey, be careful, okay. -Let me in.
translation.zh: -嘿 小心 -让我进去

translation.en: Open the door and let me in.
translation.zh: 开门让我进去

translation.en: I'm just fucking with you punk bitches.
translation.zh: 我就逗逗你们这些流氓贱人

translation.en: Hey, can you let me in?
translation.zh: 嘿 你能让我进去吗？

translation.en: -Well... -Oh, for real?
translation.zh: -好吧… -哦 真的吗？

translation.en: You really not gonna let me in?
translation.zh: 你真不打算让我进去？

translation.en: It's 2020, my guy.
translation.zh: 都2020年了 伙计

translation.en: I'm here for improv rehearsal.
translation.zh: 我是来参加即兴表演排练的

translation.en: It's just, I'm allergic to garlic.
translation.zh: 只是 我对大蒜过敏

translation.en: -If you don't open the door-- -Alright, yeah.
translation.zh: -如果你不开门… -好吧

translation.en: -Open the door. -Here you go.
translation.zh: -开门 -开了

translation.en: Ha! Run that cape, son, and that bloodaccino. I'm taking the fangs, too.
translation.zh: 红领斗篷龟儿子和那杯血布奇诺 我也要砰的一声

translation.en: Trying to get this money in 2020, baby.
translation.zh: 试着在2020年拿到这笔钱 宝贝

translation.en: ♪ Hit you with the first line, pow ♪
translation.zh: （天文学俱乐部会所）

translation.en: -Yeah! -Okay.
translation.zh: -耶！ -好吧

translation.en: I don't know if you heard, but Astronomy Club got a Netflix show, baby.
translation.zh: 我不知道你们听说了没 但天文学俱乐部上了奈飞的节目

translation.en: Why the name Astronomy Club? We're black and we're all stars.
translation.zh: 为什么叫天文学俱乐部？ 我们是黑人并且都是明星

translation.en: And like most stars, nobody knows our names.
translation.zh: 跟大多数明星一样 没人记得我们的名字

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: -Oh, my gosh. -Wow.
translation.zh: -哦 我的天 -哇

translation.en: This my room.
translation.zh: 这是我的房间

translation.en: Hollywood, we here,
translation.zh: 好莱坞 我们来啦

translation.en: living in the same house with twin beds.
translation.zh: 住在同样有两张单人床的房子里

translation.en: Man, this some bullshit.
translation.zh: 兄弟 这简直扯淡

translation.en: [woman] The producers wanted to film us living together.
translation.zh: 制片人想拍摄我们住一起的情形

translation.en: Like a reality show.
translation.zh: 就像真人秀

translation.en: At first, I thought it was a bad idea. But now that we're here,
translation.zh: 起初 我觉得这是个烂点子 但现在我们来了以后

translation.en: it's a really bad idea.
translation.zh: 这是个烂透了的点子

translation.en: I have dibs on this one, this one's mine.
translation.zh: 这张床属于我 是我的

translation.en: I am here for it.
translation.zh: 我为此而来

translation.en: I'm actually more excited for this than the sketches,
translation.zh: 我其实对这比对幽默短剧要更激动

translation.en: and I will win.
translation.zh: 我会赢的

translation.en: [producer] It's not a competition.
translation.zh: 这不是场比赛

translation.en: Yet.
translation.zh: 暂时而已

translation.en: Hey, there's only seven beds,
translation.zh: 嘿 这里只有七张床

translation.en: so somebody's gotta sleep on the couch.
translation.zh: 所以有人要睡沙发

translation.en: -Not it. -I'll do it.
translation.zh: -我不要 -我来

translation.en: I'm the eighth member of the group.
translation.zh: 我是团队的第八人

translation.en: They tend to ignore me. But if I'm easygoing and self-deprecating,
translation.zh: 他们常常无视我 但如果我随和又自嘲

translation.en: then I'm the one who's in charge.
translation.zh: 那我就会成为老大

translation.en: My role in the group is the voice of reason.
translation.zh: 我在团队的角色是理性之音

translation.en: Now, in comedy, we call that the straight man.
translation.zh: 在喜剧中 我们把那种角色称为捧哏

translation.en: As a gay man, I find that problematic.
translation.zh: 作为一名同性恋 我觉得那叫法有问题

translation.en: The rooms are the same, so we don't have to fight over who gets what.
translation.zh: 房间都一样 所以我们没必要为分配争执

translation.en: Actually, hey, hey, actually this room has a moon lamp.
translation.zh: 实际上 嘿 实际上这个房间有盏月亮灯

translation.en: I want that lamp. I'm getting that lamp.
translation.zh: 我想要那盏灯 我要去拿那盏灯

translation.en: -All right, all right now. -I want the lamp.
translation.zh: -好了 现在 -我想要那盏灯

translation.en: As the leader of the group--
translation.zh: 作为团队的老大…

translation.en: Man, shut up, you ain't no leader of the group.
translation.zh: 兄弟 闭嘴 你才不是团队老大

translation.en: Astronomy Club is a group of eight comedians with huge egos.
translation.zh: 天文学俱乐部的八名喜剧人 个个都自命不凡

translation.en: It makes my job as leader pretty tough.
translation.zh: 这让我老大的工作很难开展

translation.en: [Jerah] Shut yo' ass up.
translation.zh: 闭上你的臭嘴

translation.en: Now I know how Obama felt.
translation.zh: 现在我明白奥巴马的感受了

translation.en: Oh, now it's a competition, motherfuckers.
translation.zh: 哦 现在这成了比赛 混球们

translation.en: [woman] It's not easy learning a new skill.
translation.zh: 学习一门新技能并非易事

translation.en: Here at Dignity and Ambition for Magical Negroes,
translation.zh: 在神奇黑鬼的尊严和野心学院

translation.en: or D.A.M.N., we help magical Negroes
translation.zh: 又名黑鬼学院 我们帮助经典影片中的

translation.en: from classic films
translation.zh: 神奇黑鬼们

translation.en: go from supporting to lead.
translation.zh: 从配角成为主角

translation.en: Repeat after me,
translation.zh: 跟我读

translation.en: "I am the lead character of my own story."
translation.zh: “我是自己故事的主宰。”

translation.en: [all] I am the lead character of my own story.
translation.zh: 我是自己故事的主角

translation.en: "I am more than the advice
translation.zh: “我不仅仅是

translation.en: I give white people."
translation.zh: 给白人提建议的货色。”

translation.en: [all] I am more than the advice
translation.zh: 我不仅仅是

translation.en: I give white people.
translation.zh: 给白人提建议的货色

translation.en: "I will not just magically disappear,
translation.zh: “我不会在感觉工作完成后，

translation.en: once I feel my work is done."
translation.zh: 就神奇的消失。”

translation.en: I will not just...
translation.zh: 我不会…

translation.en: [sighs] We talked about this.
translation.zh: 我们谈过这事

translation.en: Hello, my name is Oda Mae,
translation.zh: 大家好 我叫奥黛·梅

translation.en: and it's been 30 days since I last helped a white person, or ghost, find themselves.
translation.zh: 我上次帮助白人或鬼找到自我 是在30天前

translation.en: [Oda Mae] I mean, it's hard.
translation.zh: 我是说 这很困难

translation.en: I can't walk past a pottery class
translation.zh: 我没法路过陶艺课

translation.en: without telling some white woman, "You in danger, girl."
translation.zh: 而不告诉某个白人女性 “姑娘，你有危险。”

translation.en: But as long as I carry around my "You ain't a coon" coin,
translation.zh: 但只要我带着“你不是个老黑”硬币

translation.en: I remember.
translation.zh: 我就会记得

translation.en: Heads, I'm in charge. Tails, I'm also in charge.
translation.zh: 正面向上 我说了算 反面向上 也是我说了算

translation.en: I'm in charge.
translation.zh: 全由我说了算

translation.en: Magical Negroes seek us out
translation.zh: 神奇黑鬼们找到我们

translation.en: because they desperately want to serve themselves,
translation.zh: 因为他们迫切的想为自己服务

translation.en: not just a white narrative.
translation.zh: 而不是仅为白人效力

translation.en: Alright Colburn, where we going today?
translation.zh: 科尔伯恩 今天我们去哪？

translation.en: Wherever she wants to go.
translation.zh: 她想去哪 就去哪

translation.en: No, Negro, you're driving yourself today.
translation.zh: 不对 黑鬼 今天你为自己开车

translation.en: No white woman?
translation.zh: 不为白人女性开？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: If I can't drive a white person,
translation.zh: 如果我不能为白人开车

translation.en: we all gonna die today.
translation.zh: 今天我们都得死

translation.en: -[screams] -No, no...
translation.zh: 不 不…

translation.en: This is why we can't use a real car.
translation.zh: 这就是我们不能用真车的原因

translation.en: Breaking old habits can be a challenge.
translation.zh: 打破固有习惯是种挑战

translation.en: Take Bagger Vance, for instance.
translation.zh: 以巴格·范斯为例

translation.en: He's been in and out of here 15 times.
translation.zh: 他进出这里已经有15次

translation.en: One minute, he's making great progress, and the next,
translation.zh: 上一分钟 他正有所进展 下一分钟

translation.en: I'm watching the PGA tournament and...
translation.zh: 我正在看美国职业高尔夫锦标赛…

translation.en: [gold commentator] McIlroy about to putt for birdie and...
translation.zh: 麦克罗伊正准备 以低于标准杆一杆打进…

translation.en: Wait, there appears to be a trespasser on the green.
translation.zh: 等等 草地上似乎有擅闯者

translation.en: Bagger, honey, this is supposed to be a self-portrait.
translation.zh: 巴格 亲爱的 这本该是自画像

translation.en: I need help. I need help.
translation.zh: 我需要帮助

translation.en: Sometimes, desperate times call for desperate measures.
translation.zh: 有时 绝望时刻需要放绝招

translation.en: John, this here is the white mile.
translation.zh: 约翰 这是白里

translation.en: The goal is to get from point A to point B
translation.zh: 目标是从A点到B点

translation.en: without hugging the sickness out of a white person.
translation.zh: 不要拥抱白人来帮他们驱除病魔

translation.en: You think you can do that?
translation.zh: 你觉得自己能办到吗？

translation.en: I'm so tired, boss,
translation.zh: 老板 我太厌倦

translation.en: of living for the white man.
translation.zh: 为白人而活了

translation.en: -Let's do this. -Go.
translation.zh: -我们开始吧 -走

translation.en: So, he's not gonna heal us?
translation.zh: 所以他不会治愈我们了？

translation.en: This is not about you.
translation.zh: 这与你无关

translation.en: Not today.
translation.zh: 今天不行

translation.en: Sometimes people ask me, "Why this? Why them, why now?"
translation.zh: 有时别人会问我：“为什么干这个？ 为什么是他们？为什么是现在？”

translation.en: I haven't told anyone this before,
translation.zh: 我还从没跟任何人说过

translation.en: but my... father was actually a Magical Negro.
translation.zh: 我还从没跟任何人说过 但我父亲其实是个神奇黑鬼

translation.en: He was always off helping some white man fulfill his destiny.
translation.zh: 他总是外出帮助白人完成他们的使命

translation.en: Maybe that's why I'm compelled to do this work.
translation.zh: 也许那是我必须从事这项工作的原因

translation.en: I was his child,
translation.zh: 我是他的孩子

translation.en: but someone else was always "the one."
translation.zh: 但他命定之人却总是别人

translation.en: But regardless of my personal hang-ups,
translation.zh: 但撇开我的个人问题

translation.en: I can tell we're making a real difference at D.A.M.N.
translation.zh: 我可以说在黑鬼学院 我们正带来切实的影响

translation.en: Usually I am the help,
translation.zh: 通常情况下我是帮手

translation.en: but today, I have found
translation.zh: 但今天 我发现

translation.en: the broom that I can use for myself, right here, in my heart.
translation.zh: 为自己清理阴霾的扫帚 就在这里 在我心里

translation.en: Come on, come on, get in here.
translation.zh: 来 过来这里

translation.en: [all] We love you.
translation.zh: 我们爱你

translation.en: 'Scuse me?
translation.zh: 打扰了

translation.en: Uh, sorry, excuse me. I think I might be lost, can anybody help me?
translation.zh: 抱歉 打扰下 我想我迷路了 有人能帮我吗？

translation.en: -He what? -I can help you.
translation.zh: -他什么？ -我可以帮你

translation.en: -[overlapping chatter] -No, no!
translation.zh: 别 别！

translation.en: I mean, it's a process.
translation.zh: 我是说 这有个过程

translation.en: No, Negro!
translation.zh: 别 黑鬼！

translation.en: He's just looking for a Starbucks!
translation.zh: 他只是在找星巴克！

translation.en: I need help.
translation.zh: 我需要帮助

translation.en: -Open it. Come on. -Okay, a gift.
translation.zh: -打开它 -好的 一份礼物

translation.en: -Chocolate. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -巧克力 -耶

translation.en: We could use this for the roof.
translation.zh: 我们可以用这个来做屋顶

translation.en: You shouldn't have.
translation.zh: 你们不该那么做

translation.en: Mama, Papa, we have an announcement.
translation.zh: 爸 妈 我们有事宣布

translation.en: We're pregnant.
translation.zh: 我们怀孕了

translation.en: Our baby's having a baby.
translation.zh: 我们的宝贝要生小宝贝了

translation.en: Rumble, snap, drip.
translation.zh: 隆隆 啪啪 滴滴

translation.en: Don't worry about Gramps, he's got a case of the old PTSD.
translation.zh: 不用担心爷爷 他有创伤后应激障碍

translation.en: Everyone, please, raise your glasses.
translation.zh: 大伙儿 请举起你们的杯子

translation.en: And baby makes three.
translation.zh: 天赐良缘

translation.en: And baby makes--
translation.zh: 天赐…

translation.en: Guys, use your napkins.
translation.zh: 伙计们 用餐巾纸

translation.en: Don't let go! No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Caroline, I said use a napkin.
translation.zh: 卡罗琳 我说了用餐巾纸

translation.en: [mother] Yeah, keep going. Yeah, that's my little man.
translation.zh: 对 继续 对 这才是我的小男子汉

translation.en: No...
translation.zh: 不…

translation.en: And baby makes three.
translation.zh: 天赐良缘

translation.en: Rumble, snap...
translation.zh: 隆隆 啪啪

translation.en: drip.
translation.zh: 滴滴

translation.en: Sometimes it's fun to play with your food.
translation.zh: 有时玩食物很有趣

translation.en: [Jonathan] As per usual, the group ignored my advice
translation.zh: 一如既往 团队无视了我的建议

translation.en: and split into alliances.
translation.zh: 分裂成几个联盟

translation.en: That's why we're called Astronomy Club.
translation.zh: 所以我们被称为天文学俱乐部

translation.en: We're light years apart.
translation.zh: 我们相隔光年

translation.en: [Jerah] Nigga, shut up.
translation.zh: 兄弟 闭嘴

translation.en: How do you keep getting in here?
translation.zh: 你是怎么能一直进来的？

translation.en: Look, I don't care who gets the moon lamp, as long as one of us gets it, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 我不在乎谁拿到月亮灯 只要是我们中的一个就行 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but Caroline, do you really want the lamp? You're just so plain.
translation.zh: 没错 但卡罗琳 你真想要那盏灯吗？ 你太直白了

translation.en: In a good way.
translation.zh: 很妙的直白

translation.en: As little sister of the group, I'm really used to getting along with everyone,
translation.zh: 作为这个团队的小妹妹 我习惯与大家和谐共处

translation.en: but if you cross me, I will cut you.
translation.zh: 但如果你惹我 我会阉了你

translation.en: Ray, Shawtane and I form a real black team.
translation.zh: 雷 肖坦和我组成了真正的全黑组

translation.en: We the only members of AC who grew up in the hood.
translation.zh: 天文学俱乐部中只有我们在社区长大

translation.en: Well, so did James, but he kind of white.
translation.zh: 好吧 詹姆斯也是 但他有点白人范

translation.en: I'm the only one on the team who eats mayo.
translation.zh: 我是团队中唯一吃蛋黄酱的人

translation.en: So, I get to keep the whole jar to myself.
translation.zh: 所以这一整罐都是我的

translation.en: I have an idea.
translation.zh: 我有个主意

translation.en: What if I rub my junk all over the moon lamp,
translation.zh: 要是我在月亮灯上涂满我的垃圾

translation.en: you know, to mark our territory?
translation.zh: 标记我们的领地 怎么样？

translation.en: -Don't do that. -I already did.
translation.zh: -别那么做 -我已经干了

translation.en: I was raised Huxtable black,
translation.zh: 我是个黑淑女

translation.en: but I'm not afraid to get down and dirty when the situation calls for it.
translation.zh: 但当形势需要 我不怕降低身段 玩手段

translation.en: Penis.
translation.zh: 鸡鸡

translation.en: [man] I don't care about the lamp.
translation.zh: 我对灯没兴趣

translation.en: I just want to write my sexy clown jokes and listen to records,
translation.zh: 我只想写我的性感小丑笑话 听唱片

translation.en: but I was not about to get stuck with James.
translation.zh: 但我不想和詹姆斯困在一起

translation.en: [man] All right, stay with us, just hold on.
translation.zh: 保持清醒 坚持住

translation.en: -Just hold on. We need a doctor. -Come on.
translation.zh: -坚持住 我们需要医生 -加油

translation.en: -What's happening? -We have a 27-year-old female,
translation.zh: -发生了什么？ -一名27岁的女性

translation.en: labored breathing, overheating.
translation.zh: 呼吸困难并过热

translation.en: We can't say how long she's been in this state, but one thing's for sure,
translation.zh: 我们不能断言她这个状态持续了多久 但可以确定一件事

translation.en: she has completely sweated out her edges.
translation.zh: 她彻底汗湿了额前刘海

translation.en: [doctor] My God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: Get this woman to an OR.
translation.zh: 给这位女士准备手术室

translation.en: We need to lay these edges, stat.
translation.zh: 我们得整好这些额前刘海

translation.en: Yes, doctor.
translation.zh: 好的 医生

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 发生了什么？

translation.en: She overextended herself at a Drake concert.
translation.zh: 她在德雷克的演唱会上过于投入

translation.en: Get her in a heated shower cap.
translation.zh: 给她戴上热淋浴帽

translation.en: We need to deep condition pre-op to stop the internal frizzing.
translation.zh: 我们需要在手术前进行深层处理 制止内部卷曲

translation.en: Damn, there must be something in the air.
translation.zh: 操 空气中肯定有什么东西

translation.en: Yeah, son, called humidity.
translation.zh: 没错 小子 那叫潮湿

translation.en: How did this happen?
translation.zh: 怎么会发生这种事？

translation.en: -I used Eco Styler and bee's wax. -Miss, please conserve your energy.
translation.zh: -我用了定型啫喱和蜜蜂牌发蜡 -小姐 请保存能量

translation.en: I didn't think there was anything stronger than bee's wax.
translation.zh: 我觉得没什么比蜜蜂牌发蜡更强力了

translation.en: Blow dryer. Blow dryer!
translation.zh: 吹风机

translation.en: Okay, give her 10 cc's of Jamaican black castor oil.
translation.zh: 给她注射10毫升牙买加黑蓖麻油

translation.en: -Bring in the Garnier Fructis. -But, Doctor,
translation.zh: -把卡尼尔拿进来 -但是 医生

translation.en: she's a 4C natural. That's hair gel for white people.
translation.zh: 她是天生的4C发质 而那是给白人用的发胶

translation.en: A weak bond is our only hope of keeping her edges in tact.
translation.zh: 弱定型是我们保住她额前刘海的 唯一希望

translation.en: If we go full hold, we could rip her edges clean off.
translation.zh: 如果我们用强定型 可能会彻底毁掉她的额前刘海

translation.en: But what's that gonna give her? A couple of minutes, half hour tops.
translation.zh: 但那会给她带来什么？ 几分钟 最多半小时

translation.en: Well, it's either that or a full edge transplant.
translation.zh: 要么那样 要么全额前刘海移植

translation.en: Pass me the defibrillator, I'm gonna shock these
translation.zh: 给我除颤器 我要电活

translation.en: God damn baby hairs back to life.
translation.zh: 这些他妈的额前刘海

translation.en: You're a mad woman.
translation.zh: 你这个疯女人

translation.en: I will not lose another hairline on my watch.
translation.zh: 我不会再让一片发际线 消失在我眼前

translation.en: Do you hear me?
translation.zh: 你听到了吗？

translation.en: And if you don't like it, you can get the hell out of my OR.
translation.zh: 如果你不喜欢 可以滚出我的手术室

translation.en: It is the middle of August,
translation.zh: 现在是八月中旬

translation.en: the moment she walks out of that door--
translation.zh: 她走出那扇门的一刻…

translation.en: I said get the hell out of my OR!
translation.zh: 我说了他妈滚出我的手术室！

translation.en: Fine!
translation.zh: 好吧！

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦 不

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 哦 不

translation.en: Doctor?
translation.zh: 医生？

translation.en: We have a problem.
translation.zh: 我们有个问题

translation.en: A snatched wig, and not in a good way.
translation.zh: 掉落的假发 情况不妙

translation.en: There's no way we can save these edges now.
translation.zh: 现在我们救不了这些额前刘海了

translation.en: I'm calling it.
translation.zh: 我要宣布

translation.en: Time of death, 4:15 p.m.
translation.zh: 死亡时间 下午4:15

translation.en: We'll need to contact the family.
translation.zh: 我们需要联系家人

translation.en: Or, I could just like...
translation.zh: 或者 我能就这样…

translation.en: -Oh, my God, girl, nuh-uh. We have gel. -You cannot.
translation.zh: -哦 天 姑娘 我们有啫喱 -你不能那样

translation.en: -Right here, we've got Garnier. -You know better than that.
translation.zh: -就在这里 我们有卡尼尔 -你明知道那样不行

translation.en: What is the meaning of this?
translation.zh: 这什么意思？

translation.en: -Identify yourself. -It is I,
translation.zh: -表明你的身份 -是我

translation.en: Robin of Locksley.
translation.zh: 侠盗罗宾汉

translation.en: I steal from the rich and I give to the poor.
translation.zh: 我劫富济贫

translation.en: I take your gold in the honor
translation.zh: 我劫富济贫 我拿走你的金子

translation.en: -of the people of Nottingham. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 收获诺丁汉人民的尊敬

translation.en: All the people of Nottingham?
translation.zh: 诺丁汉的所有人？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？

translation.en: You got some nerve. You wanna come in here and rob the one rich, black house
translation.zh: 你真有胆量 你想闯进这里

translation.en: -in Nottingham. -No, sir, I assure you, my message
translation.zh: -抢劫诺丁汉一个富有的黑人家庭 -不是的 先生 我向你保证

translation.en: is one of truth and of justice.
translation.zh: 我的信息是真理和正义

translation.en: -Honey, who dis man? -You wanna know dis?
translation.zh: -亲爱的 这人是谁？ -你想知道？

translation.en: He Robin of Locksley.
translation.zh: 他是罗宾汉

translation.en: He robbing the rich and give to the white.
translation.zh: 他劫富济白

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, that's not what is happening here,
translation.zh: 不 不是那样的

translation.en: you're twisting my words.
translation.zh: 你扭曲了我的话

translation.en: I give to the poor.
translation.zh: 我劫富济贫

translation.en: It is a good thing that I am doing.
translation.zh: 我在做的是好事

translation.en: Who are these poor people? 'Cause when we was poor,
translation.zh: 这些穷人是谁？ 因为在我们贫困潦倒

translation.en: and I was digging moats, 8:00 to 8:00 every day,
translation.zh: 并且我全年无休 每天12个小时

translation.en: 365 days a year,
translation.zh: 挖护城河时

translation.en: I ain't seen no white man in green tights
translation.zh: 我从没见过穿绿色紧身裤的白男

translation.en: jumping around giving me no gold.
translation.zh: 跳来跳去要给我金子

translation.en: -Where'd it go? -I mean, you can't get to everybody.
translation.zh: -你那时在哪？ -我是说 没法普救众生

translation.en: You mean you didn't have time to get to the south side of Sherwood.
translation.zh: 你是说你没空去舍伍德南部

translation.en: Well, the south side is very dangerous after 9:00 p.m.
translation.zh: 晚上九点后的南部地区非常危险

translation.en: There are a lot of thieves and--
translation.zh: 贼很多 并且…

translation.en: Well, I mean, I am a thief, but I'm not that kind of thief.
translation.zh: 好吧 我是说 我是贼 但不是那种贼

translation.en: You mean, like a black thief?
translation.zh: 你是指黑人贼？

translation.en: Shit. Oh, listen,
translation.zh: 操 哦 听着

translation.en: Um, oh, my motives are pure here.
translation.zh: 我的动机很纯粹

translation.en: They're not racially motivated, it's strictly class.
translation.zh: 我的动机很纯粹 与种族无关 只跟阶级有关 我是说

translation.en: I mean, I don't even see color.
translation.zh: 与种族无关 只跟阶级有关 我是说 我根本看不出颜色

translation.en: -[groans] -It's okay, baby, it's okay, I got it.
translation.zh: 没事 宝贝 我来处理

translation.en: Man, I just got this money.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我刚刚发家

translation.en: Every time black people get a little bit of money,
translation.zh: 每次我能拿到一丁点钱

translation.en: you wanna come and take it.
translation.zh: 你就想来拿走

translation.en: What did I say? My brother.
translation.zh: 我刚是怎么说的？兄弟

translation.en: Put your hand down.
translation.zh: 放下你的手

translation.en: I'm liberal.
translation.zh: 我是自由主义者

translation.en: -I'm one of you, my man, c'mon-- -Oh, he one of us.
translation.zh: -我和你们是一类人 兄弟 拜托… -哦 他和我们是一类人

translation.en: So, you just out there robbing people with no consequences.
translation.zh: 所以你四处抢劫 不用承担后果

translation.en: Let me try that shit. I'd have arrows all up in my ass.
translation.zh: 让我试试 那我会被射成筛子

translation.en: I agree, the police are a problem. I've written about it.
translation.zh: 我同意 警察是个问题 我曾写过

translation.en: -You should read my articles. -Stop.
translation.zh: -你该看看我的文章 -住口

translation.en: Just shoot this fool so we can go back to bed.
translation.zh: 射死这傻瓜 我们就能回床上睡觉了

translation.en: -No, no, no, no, no. -Out.
translation.zh: -别 -发射

translation.en: -I... -Hey, Robin, what's taking so long, man?
translation.zh: -我… -嘿 罗宾 你怎么那么久 兄弟？

translation.en: Your horse acting crazy outside. Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 你的马在外面像个疯子 哦 操

translation.en: Is that Marook and Trina? This your crib?
translation.zh: 是马鲁克和特里娜吗？ 这是你们家？

translation.en: -What up, boy? -Oh, shit.
translation.zh: -别来无恙 兄弟？ -哦 操

translation.en: -Little John, you know this man? -Oh yeah, we grew up together, man.
translation.zh: -小约翰 你认识这个人？ -哦 是的 我们一起长大 兄弟

translation.en: Whoo! You know, you fucked up robbing this house, right?
translation.zh: 你抢劫这个房子搞砸了 对吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -I heard you had a nice spot
translation.zh: -是的 -我听说你在西部

translation.en: on the west side, but I didn't believe it. Damn.
translation.zh: 有个不错的地方 但我没信 该死

translation.en: You done come up, brother. Hey?
translation.zh: 你们发家了 嘿？

translation.en: How come we don't see you no more?
translation.zh: 我们怎么会没再见面的？

translation.en: Oh, well, we had to move out.
translation.zh: 哦 好吧 我们不得不搬走

translation.en: Did you, though? Did you?
translation.zh: 不过 是吗？是那样吗？

translation.en: You had to move out?
translation.zh: 你们必须搬走？

translation.en: Why you leave the community, Roo?
translation.zh: 你为什么离开社区 鲁？

translation.en: Well, I mean. Look, you know...
translation.zh: 好吧 我是说 听着

translation.en: After 9:00 p.m., it's not that safe.
translation.zh: 晚上九点后 那里就不怎么安全了

translation.en: And the schools here are better. So...
translation.zh: -而且这里的学校更好 所以… -操

translation.en: I guess it's true what they say: soon as a black man gets some moat money,
translation.zh: 我想俗话说得没错 一旦黑人赚到了挖护城河的钱

translation.en: he turn his back on the hood.
translation.zh: 就会背叛自己的社区

translation.en: See Marook, I told you,
translation.zh: 听着 马鲁克 我告诉过你

translation.en: streets is talking.
translation.zh: 流言蜚语到处传

translation.en: You twisting my words, Trina.
translation.zh: 你在歪曲我的话 特里娜

translation.en: You used to dig moats in the hood.
translation.zh: 你以前在社区挖护城河

translation.en: Now what, you sold the company to the royals?
translation.zh: 现在呢 你把公司卖给了贵族？

translation.en: LJ, my brother, I-- I'm like you.
translation.zh: LJ 我的兄弟 我跟你一样

translation.en: I promise you, my intentions are pure.
translation.zh: 我向你保证 我的意图是纯洁的

translation.en: Alright, I'm down for the community.
translation.zh: 我支持社区

translation.en: They just can't really afford my rates anymore.
translation.zh: 只是他们负担不起我的费用了

translation.en: Marook, Marook, Marook, you really need to support your community.
translation.zh: 马鲁克 你确实需要支持自己的社区

translation.en: Put your fist down.
translation.zh: 放下你的拳头

translation.en: I know you ain't saying some shit. Shut up!
translation.zh: 我知道你狗嘴吐不出象牙 闭嘴！

translation.en: This is a A and B conversation,
translation.zh: 这是A和B的对话

translation.en: and B stands for black.
translation.zh: B指黑人

translation.en: So see your cracker ass up outta this.
translation.zh: 所以你不要瞎掺和

translation.en: Your man come up here putting his fist up like he know me.
translation.zh: 你的人闯进这里 举起拳头 好像他认识我一样
警察来了

translation.en: There you are, Robin.
translation.zh: 你在这 罗宾

translation.en: How dare you steal from my one black friend, Marook.
translation.zh: 你胆敢盗窃我的黑人朋友 马鲁克

translation.en: I gotcha.
translation.zh: 我逮到你了

translation.en: Wait a minute, you calling the cops on niggas, Marook?
translation.zh: 等等 你叫警察来抓黑鬼 马鲁克？

translation.en: Well, I don't know if I would consider us all to be--
translation.zh: 我不知道自己是否会认为我们…

translation.en: -Shut up, nigga. -You're coming with me.
translation.zh: -闭嘴 黑鬼 -你跟我走

translation.en: Marook, I'll see you out on the green on Sunday.
translation.zh: 马鲁克 周日高尔夫球场见

translation.en: -Stay woke! -Hey, man, I'm sorry about that.
translation.zh: -别走 马鲁克 -嘿 兄弟 我为此道歉

translation.en: Like, he be tripping sometimes, and like,
translation.zh: 人有时会犯傻 就像…

translation.en: I'mma talk to him though. He ain't gonna be that way anymore.
translation.zh: 但我会跟他谈谈 他不会再那样了

translation.en: You owe me shit from back in the day.
translation.zh: 你从很久以前就欠我的了

translation.en: Trina, you look good, girl.
translation.zh: 特里娜 你真美 姑娘

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, baby.
translation.zh: 好吧 宝贝

translation.en: Even split up, the group couldn't agree.
translation.zh: 就连分裂 团队也没法一致

translation.en: We'd rather suffer together than let one person win.
translation.zh: 我们宁可一起遭罪 也不愿让一个人赢

translation.en: And that's why we're called Astronomy Club.
translation.zh: 所以我们被称为天文学俱乐部

translation.en: It is hereby decided that the lamp shall choose its owner.
translation.zh: 在此决定 由灯选择自己的主人

translation.en: Who is making these decisions?
translation.zh: 做这些决定的是谁？

translation.en: -The lamp, Jonathan, she just said it. -[Monique] If your name is announced,
translation.zh: 灯 乔纳森 她刚说过了 如果叫到你的名字

translation.en: you may take one of these roses and stay.
translation.zh: 你就可以拿上一枝玫瑰 并留下

translation.en: If it is not, you must say goodbye to the lamp.
translation.zh: 如果没有 你就要和灯说再见了

translation.en: -Jerah. -Whoo! Ha-ha!
translation.zh: 耶拉

translation.en: Keisha.
translation.zh: 凯莎

translation.en: -[exclaims[ -Keisha.
translation.zh: 凯莎

translation.en: Ray.
translation.zh: 雷

translation.en: James III.
translation.zh: 詹姆斯三世

translation.en: All right, Tane, here you go.
translation.zh: 好 肖坦 给你

translation.en: All right, cool.
translation.zh: 好的 酷

translation.en: I have two roses left.
translation.zh: 我还剩两支玫瑰

translation.en: Okay, this one's for me and this one's for Caroline.
translation.zh: 这一支是我的 而另一支给卡罗琳

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 耶

translation.en: I told you.
translation.zh: 我就说吧

translation.en: Everybody we wanted got a rose.
translation.zh: 我们意向中的人都拿到了玫瑰

translation.en: We all deserve this.
translation.zh: 我们都值得拥有

translation.en: Y'all know this doesn't make sense, right?
translation.zh: 你们知道这毫无道理 对吗？

translation.en: Makes sense to me.
translation.zh: 我觉得有道理

translation.en: -I'm cool. -I'm gonna kill that lamp.
translation.zh: -我觉得挺好 -我要毁了那灯

translation.en: Almost losing the moon lamp, it really put things in perspective.
translation.zh: 差点失去了月亮灯 这让我们能正确看待事情

translation.en: You have to value the precious things in life.
translation.zh: 你必须珍惜生命中宝贵的事物

translation.en: Friendship. The lamp.
translation.zh: 友情 灯

translation.en: We agreed to move it to the living room, where we can all enjoy it.
translation.zh: 我们同意把灯移到客厅 这样我们都可以享受到

translation.en: Goodnight, moon lamp.
translation.zh: 晚安 月亮灯

translation.en: See you in the morning, moon lamp.
translation.zh: 明早见 月亮灯

translation.en: The moon lamp is mine.
translation.zh: 月亮灯是我的

translation.en: [Jerah] Shut up.
translation.zh: 闭嘴

translation.en: ♪ When we hit you With the first line, pow ♪
translation.zh: （字幕翻译：Amber K）
